com.bytelightning.opensource.pokerface

Class PokerFace

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bytelightning.opensource.pokerface.PokerFace

  • public class PokerFace
extends Object
    Asynchronous, fully streaming, HTTP/1.1, dynamic, scriptable reverse proxy. This class wires together all needed pieces (consulting the supplied configuration data).

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  PokerFace.SetupCompleteCallback
      Invoked by script endpoints to let PokerFace know they have completed their setup process.

    • Method Detail

      • config

        public void config(HierarchicalConfiguration config)
            throws Exception
        Configures all the needed components, but does not actually start the server.
        Parameters:
        config - Contains all information needed to fully wire up the http, https, and httpclient components of this reverse proxy.
        Throws:
        Exception - Yeah, a lot can go wrong here, but at least it will be caught immediately :-)

      • configureScripts

        protected boolean configureScripts(List<Path> jsLibs,
                                   HierarchicalConfiguration scriptConfig,
                                   Path baseScriptDirectory,
                                   boolean watchScriptDirectory)
        If requested by the user, this method walks the script directory discovering, loading, compiling, and initialing an .js javascript files it finds in the specified directory or it's children.
        Parameters:
        baseScriptDirectory - The contents of this directory should be structured in the same layout as the url's we wish to interfere with.
        watchScriptDirectory - If true, a watch will be placed on baseScriptDirectory and any javascript file modifications (cud) will be dynamically rebuilt and reflected in the running server.
        Returns:
        True if all scripts were successfully loaded.

      • loadScriptLibrary

        protected boolean loadScriptLibrary(Path lib)
        Load the specified JavaScript library into the global scope of the Nashorn engine
        Parameters:
        lib - Path to the JavaScript library.

      • start

        public boolean start()
        All user definable configuration has occurred, fire up the server.

      • stop

        public void stop()
          throws IOException
        Shut it all down.
        Throws:
        IOException
